channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10561] Forward port: HBASE-10212 New rpc metric: number of active handler
item.description:
The metrics implementation has changed a lot in 0.96.
Forward port HBASE-10212 to 0.96 and later.
item.summary: Forward port: HBASE-10212 New rpc metric: number of active handler

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
How about this one.
Chao Shi , it would better if you have chance to take a look at the attached patch as well, since you're the original rpc scheduler and HBASE-10212's author

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12644092/HBASE-10561.txt
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12644092

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 3 new or modified tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TestAssignmentManager

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop2-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-prefix-tree.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-client.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-common.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-protocol.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-server.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-examples.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-thrift.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop-compat.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9494//console

This message is automatically generated.
Hi Liang, +1 and thanks for porting this to 0.96. We're moving to 0.96 and will benefit from your effort.
I'll commit it tomorrow unless any objection.

Integreted into trunk, 0.98 and 0.96 branches.
There is a little difference in each branch, so the final committed stuff was not exactly same with the original patch, just FYI
Thank you Matteo Bertozzi, Chao Shi for your review.
